sentences.en: Finally, the Jews were allowed to resettle in England legally by an accidental affair.
sentences.cn: 最后因为一次偶然事件, 犹太人获准重新回到英国.

sentences.en: He got congress to appropriate $ 25 million to resettle destitute families on farms.
sentences.cn: 他叫国会拨款二千五百万美元在农村安置贫困的家庭.

sentences.en: Hundreds of Hmong have managed to escape Laos and resettle in foreign countries as refugees.
sentences.cn: 数百赫蒙族人设法逃离老挝定居国外,这些人成为了难民.

sentences.en: The area was resettled in the latter half of the century.
sentences.cn: 在该世纪下半叶这个地区重新有人定居。

trans.tran_en: to start using an area again as a place to live

trans.tran_cn: 使（土地、地区等）重新成为定居点
帮助（尤指难民）定居他国
